TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NextPreviousPagerField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField

summary.span: 表示一个字段，该字段显示 控件中使用户能够分页浏览数据的导航控件。

span.span: Represents a field that displays navigation controls in a control enable users to page through data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示一个字段，显示中的导航控件控件。The class represents a field that displays navigation controls in a control. 可以使用这些导航控件实现的控件显示的数据进行分页到接口，如控件。These navigation controls can be used to page through data that are displayed by a control that implements the interface, such as the control. 类提供按钮使用户能够一次，一页数据的页导航或跳转到第一个或最后一个数据页。The class provides buttons that enable users to navigate through the pages of data one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page of data. 你可以自定义的外观对象使用属性可设置按钮的样式。You can customize the appearance of the object by using the property to set the style of the buttons. 你还可以使用属性来选择显示的按钮的类型。You can also use the property to choose the type of button that is displayed. 下表列出了可用的按钮类型。The following table lists the available button types. |按钮类型Button type|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| ||一个 控件。A control.| ||一个 控件。An control.| ||一个 控件。A control.| 可以隐藏对象在通过设置属性`false`。You can hide a object in a control by setting the property to `false`. 您还可以通过设置隐藏各个按钮 （第一页、 前一页、 下一步页和最后一页按钮） ， ， ，和属性设置为`false`。You can also hide the individual buttons (the first-page, previous-page, next-page, and last-page buttons) by setting the , , , and properties to `false`. 控制，你可以通过使用指定的每个按钮的自定义文本， ， ，和属性。The control enables you to specify custom text for each button by using the , , , and properties. 当属性设置为`ButtonType.Image`，必须提供该按钮将显示图像的 URL。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, you must provide the URL to an image that will be displayed for the button. 可以通过设置设置为每个按钮的单独映像， ， ，和属性。You can set images individually for each button by setting the , , , and properties. 当属性设置为`ButtonType.Image`，对应的文本属性充当图像的替换文字。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the corresponding text property acts as the alternate text for the image. 例如，通过指定的文本属性显示为第一页图像按钮的替换文字。For example, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the first-page image button. 在支持工具提示的浏览器，此文本也显示为工具提示。In browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象中显示的数据进行分页控件。The following example shows how to use a object to page through data that is displayed in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField/CS/NextPreviousPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField/VB/NextPreviousPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use the constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 此构造函数通常用于将字段添加到动态创建控件。This constructor is typically used when you are adding fields to a dynamically created control. 若要添加动态对象控制，请新建一个对象、 设置其属性，并将其添加到的字段集合控件。To add a object dynamically to a control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数中动态添加对象传递给控件。The following example shows how to use the constructor to dynamically add a object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor/CS/NextPreviousPagerFieldCtorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor/VB/NextPreviousPagerFieldCtorVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ButtonCssClass { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于在浏览器上呈现页导航字段的按钮的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。

span.span: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to render the buttons of the pager field on the browser.

value.span: 用于在客户端上呈现页导航字段的按钮的 CSS 类。

span.span: The CSS class used to render the buttons of the pager field on the client.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string, which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要在浏览器的页导航字段的按钮上的呈现的 CSS 类。Use the property to specify the CSS class to render on the browser for the buttons of the pager field. 此属性始终将呈现为的类特性，而不考虑浏览器。This property will always be rendered as the class attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!NOTE] > 不支持 CSS，设置浏览器上属性不起作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property has no effect. 在 viewstate 中存储此属性的值。The value of this property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性可指定 CSS 类中的按钮对象控件。The following example shows how to use the property to specify a CSS class for buttons in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/CS/NextPreviousPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/VB/NextPreviousPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the button type to display in the pager field.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定在按钮字段中显示哪种类型的按钮。Use the property to specify which type of button is displayed in a button field. 下表列出了可用的按钮类型。The following table lists the available button types. |按钮类型值Button type value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||一个 控件。A control.| ||一个 控件。An control.| ||一个 控件。A control.| 当设置为`ButtonType.Image`，必须设置要通过使用下表中显示的属性显示的按钮的图像。When is set to `ButtonType.Image`, you must set the image to display for the buttons by using the properties shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.| ||为上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.| ||为下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the next-page button.| ||为最后一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the last-page button.| 值属性存储在 viewstate 中。The value of the property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定在显示的图像按钮对象控件。The following example shows how to use the property to specify that image buttons are displayed in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/CS/NextPreviousPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/VB/NextPreviousPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FirstPageImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.

value.span: 为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`ButtonType.Image`和属性设置为`true`，使用属性指定为第一页按钮显示图像的 URL。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button. 此映像可以在浏览器支持任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等）。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on) that is supported in the browser. 当属性设置为值`ButtonType.Image`，则设置属性不起作用。When the property is set to a value other than `ButtonType.Image`, setting the property has no effect. 在 viewstate 中存储此属性的值。The value of this property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性才会显示有关中的第一页按钮图像对象控件。The following example shows how to use the property to display an image for the first-page button in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/CS/NextPreviousPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/VB/NextPreviousPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FirstPageText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为第一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the first-page button.

value.span: 为第一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed for the first-page button.

value.span: 默认为“First”。

span.span: The default is "First".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，使用属性来指定要显示的第一页按钮的文本。When the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the text to display for the first-page button. 当属性设置为`ButtonType.Image`，会显示该图像和属性充当图像的替换文字。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the image is displayed and the property acts as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器，此文本也显示为工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip. 此属性的值存储在视图状态，它可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property is stored in viewstate, and it can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性可自定义的文本中的页导航字段的第一页按钮控件。The following example shows how to use the property to customize the text for the first-page button of the pager field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/CS/NextPreviousPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/VB/NextPreviousPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void HandleEvent(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs e) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub HandleEvent (e As CommandEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 处理 控件中发生的事件并执行适当的操作。

span.span: Handles events that occur in the control and performs the appropriate action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是使用一个帮助器方法方法。The method is a helper method that is used by the method. 它将调用来处理中发生事件对象的一个按钮在控件内单击时。It is called to handle events that occur in the object when one of the buttons inside the control is clicked. 方法检查属性中包含的对象`e`参数，然后执行相应的措施。The method examines the property of the object that is contained in the `e` parameter, and then performs the appropriate action. 下表列出了由提供的按钮控制和单击按钮时执行的操作。The following table lists the buttons that are provided by the control and the action that is performed when the button is clicked. |ButtonButton|CommandName 值CommandName value|操作Action| |------------|-----------------------|------------| |第一页First page||导航到数据的第一页。Navigates to the first page of data.| |前一页Previous page||导航到以前的页面的数据。Navigates to the previous page of data.| |下一页Next page||导航至下一页数据。Navigates to the next page of data.| |最后一页Last page||导航到最后一个数据页。Navigates to the last page of data.|

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`ButtonType.Image`和属性设置为`true`，使用属性指定为下一步按钮显示图像的 URL。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the next-page button. 此映像可以在浏览器支持任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等）。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on) that is supported in the browser. 当属性设置为值`ButtonType.Image`，则设置属性不起作用。When the property is set to a value other than `ButtonType.Image`, setting the property has no effect. 在 viewstate 中存储此属性的值。The value of this property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性才会显示有关中的下一页按钮图像对象控件。The following example shows how to use the property to display an image for the next-page button in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/CS/NextPreviousPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/VB/NextPreviousPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NextPageText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为下一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the next-page button.

value.span: 为下一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed for the next-page button.

value.span: 默认为“Next”。

span.span: The default is "Next".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，使用属性来指定要显示的下一步按钮的文本。When the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the text to display for the next-page button. 当属性设置为`ButtonType.Image`，会显示该图像和属性充当图像的替换文字。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the image is displayed and the property acts as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器，此文本也显示为工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip. 此属性的值存储在视图状态，它可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property is stored in viewstate, and it can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性可自定义中的页导航字段的下一页按钮的文本控件。The following example shows how to use the property to customize the text for the next-page button of the pager field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/CS/NextPreviousPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/VB/NextPreviousPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示禁用的按钮是否由 对象呈现为 控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether disabled buttons are rendered as controls by the object.

value.span: 如果禁用的按钮呈现为 控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if disabled buttons are rendered as controls; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否禁用的按钮呈现为控制通过对象。Use the property to specify whether disabled buttons are rendered as controls by the object. 通过会禁用该按钮对象时无法执行对与按钮相关联的功能。The buttons are disabled by the object when the function associated with the button cannot be performed. 例如，如果你处于数据的第一页时，将禁用第一页和上一页按钮。For example, when you are in the first page of data, the first-page and previous-page buttons are disabled. 默认情况下，对象使用指定的控件类型的呈现禁用的按钮属性。By default, the object renders the disabled buttons by using the control type specified by the property. 它还将设置该控件的属性`false`。It also sets the property of the control to `false`. 当设置为`true`、对象使用控件呈现禁用的按钮。When is set to `true`, the object uses the control to render the disabled buttons. 值属性用于设置属性控件。The value of the property is used to set the property of the control. 在 viewstate 中存储此属性的值。The value of this property is stored in viewstate.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在控件之间呈现非换行空格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether non-breaking spaces are rendered between controls.

value.span: 如果在控件之间呈现非换行空格，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if non-breaking spaces are rendered between controls; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否不间断空格 (HTML` `字符) 之间的导航控件呈现对象。Use the property to specify whether non-breaking spaces (the HTML ` ` character) are rendered between the navigation controls of the object. 你可以设置到`false`如果需要更好地控制你创建使用级联样式表 (CSS) 类的布局。You can set to `false` if you need more control over the layout that you are creating with cascading style sheet (CSS) classes. 在 viewstate 中存储此属性的值。The value of this property is stored in viewstate.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowFirstPageButton { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示第一页按钮是否显示在 对象中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the first-page button is displayed in a object.

value.span: 如果第一页按钮显示在 对象中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the first-page button is displayed in a object; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来显示或隐藏的第一页按钮对象。Use the property to show or hide the first-page button of a object. 若要显示的第一页按钮，将属性`true`。To show the first-page button, set the property to `true`. 在 viewstate 中存储此属性的值。The value of this property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以指定应显示第一页按钮。The following example shows how to use the property to specify that the first-page button should be displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField/CS/NextPreviousPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField/VB/NextPreviousPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]
